thread.title: Cops: Maryland teen killed trying to protect mother from boyfriend
thread.title_full: Cops: Maryland teen killed trying to protect mother from boyfriend - CBS News

author: Crimesider Staff AP
title: Cops: Maryland teen killed trying to protect mother from boyfriend
text:
OXON HILL, Md. -- Police in Prince George's County, Maryland say a man stabbed his girlfriend's two teenage sons when they tried to protect her from him. One son, a 14-year-old, was killed.
Officers called to the Oxon Hill apartment early Monday found 14-year-old Keyshaun Mason and his 18-year-old brother suffering from stab wounds.
Authorities say 48-year-old Sean Crawford, the live-in boyfriend, had been arguing with the woman, and Mason and his brother tried to help her.
Police say Crawford grabbed a kitchen knife and barricaded himself and the teens' mother in a bedroom. Officers say when the youths forced their way in, Crawford stabbed Mason in the chest and the other brother in the shoulder.
Authorities say Mason died at Children's Hospital. The other brother was taken to another hospital.
Crawford is charged with murder.
